istio.core.v1alpha1.Port.description: Port describes the properties of a specific port of a service.

number.description: REQUIRED: A valid non-negative integer port number.

protocol.description: REQUIRED: The protocol exposed on the port. MUST BE one of HTTP|HTTPS|GRPC|HTTP2|MONGO|TCP|TLS. TLS implies the connection will be routed based on the SNI header to the destination without terminating the TLS connection.
